info.title: MAPS Rest API
info.description: A rest web service for getting JSON formatted data about assays.

post.summary: Login and receive MAPS authentication token

403.description: Invalid login and/or password

get.description: Multiple values for platform, functional, species and purpose can be provided with comma separated strings.

parameters.name: searchName
parameters.description: Search value

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Expected values: Bead based multiplex immunoassay, Cellular Proliferation (Nab), Digital multiplexed assay, Electrochemiluminescence Immunoassay, ELISA, Flow Cytometry, InSphero Microtissues, LC-MS, LC-MS/MS, Microfluidics Immunoassay, Microfluidics-based PCR quantitation,MSD, NGS, Radioimmunoprecipitation, Turbidimetric Immunoassay

parameters.name: functional
parameters.description: Expected values: BAS, DMPK-BA, OBD, OMNI-BD, SA

parameters.name: species
parameters.description: Expected values: cyno, dog, human, mouse, rabbit, rat

parameters.name: purpose
parameters.description: Expected values: acDrug Quantitation, Biomarker Quantitation, Cytokine Quantitation, Cytotoxicity Assessment, Drug Conjugate Quantitation, Drug Quantitation, Gene Expression, Immunogenicity, Large Molecule Quantitation, Lipid Quantitation, MOA Characterization, NAb detection, Peptide Quantitation, Pharmacokinetics, Quantitation, Small Molecule Quantitation, Total Antibody Quantitation, Unconjugated Drug Quantitation

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Will display assay created or modified between given date and today. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number which will be returned. Indexing from 0

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: How many elements will be on one page

403.description: The action you are trying to perform is forbidden

get.summary: Get site assays created or modified after date

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Will display site assay created or modified between given date and today, format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number which will be returned. Indexing from 0

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: How many elements will be on one page

403.description: The action you are trying to perform is forbidden

200.description: Successfully saved resource. Number below is id of new site assay.

403.description: The action you are trying to perform is forbidden

parameters.name: siteAssayId
parameters.description: Site assay id

403.description: The action you are trying to perform is forbidden

404.description: The resource you were trying to reach is not found

get.summary: Get site assays by Ids or CRO Ids

parameters.name: siteAssayIdOrSiteCodeOfAssay
parameters.description: Site assay id

403.description: The action you are trying to perform is forbidden

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: How many elements will be on one page

get.description: Multiple values for platform, functional, species and purpose can be provided with comma separated strings.

parameters.name: searchName
parameters.description: Search value

parameters.name: workflowStatus
parameters.description: Expected values: DRAFT, SUBMITTED, REJECTED

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Expected values: Bead based multiplex immunoassay, Cellular Proliferation (Nab), Digital multiplexed assay, Electrochemiluminescence Immunoassay, ELISA, Flow Cytometry, InSphero Microtissues, LC-MS, LC-MS/MS, Microfluidics Immunoassay, Microfluidics-based PCR quantitation,MSD, NGS, Radioimmunoprecipitation, Turbidimetric Immunoassay

parameters.name: purpose

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Will display assay created or modified between given date and today. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number which will be returned. Indexing from 0

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: How many elements will be on one page
